solution_line_template: There are {dozen_cookies} cookies in 1 dozen, so in the morning, she sold {dozen_cookies} x {morning_dozen_sold} dozen = <<{dozen_cookies}*{morning_dozen_sold}={morning_cookies_sold}>>{morning_cookies_sold} cookies.

Throughout the day, she sold {morning_cookies_sold} cookies in the morning + {lunch_cookies_sold} cookies at lunch + {afternoon_cookies_sold} cookies in the afternoon = <<{morning_cookies_sold}+{lunch_cookies_sold}+{afternoon_cookies_sold}={total_cookies_sold}>>{total_cookies_sold} cookies.
She started with {initial_cookies} cookies - {total_cookies_sold} cookies sold = <<{initial_cookies}-{total_cookies_sold}={cookies_left}>>{cookies_left} cookies to take home.
